title: Innovation, efficiency, and outcomes
subtitle: Software Engineer, Developer, and Leader: I leverage strategic management and technical expertise to transform ideas into robust, scalable, and innovative digital solutions with high impact. My focus is on developing applications that solve complex problems, optimizing processes, and driving digital transformation. Driven by a passion for efficiency and excellence, I deliver projects that exceed expectations and create real value for end-users.

worksDescription: A small list of the projects in which I have worked
meDescription: Developer and expert in the integral management of programming projects based in Hermosillo, Mexico with more than 9 years of field experience, performed from the requirements gathering to the implementation of the projects. I have developed innovative technology solutions, including web, desktop, mobile and database applications, always meeting deadlines and exceeding customer expectations. Highly effective team leader, with excellent communication, coordination and problem solving skills. My approach is based on innovation, honesty and continuous learning, which has allowed me to excel in delivering successful and high quality projects. I seek to contribute in a dynamic environment where I can apply my skills, knowledge and leadership to drive digital transformation and operational efficiency in the industry.
experiencesDescription: A tour of my professional adventures
contactDescription: Let's talk about your ideas, projects or anything else

experiencesList.title1: Senior Full Stack Developer | Team Lead
experiencesList.description1: On my next path I sought new challenges, I left behind simple applications and got fully involved in developing complex systems. I founded the software development department, which eventually became a key area of the company. My developments started with internal tools and applications on the intranet and in the cloud; later, new custom developments were made for clients, where the main features of these were desktop applications, services, web applications and mobile applications along with integrations with devices for the management, monitoring and reporting to the competent authorities of their processes. Over time, I not only developed software, but also started, under my leadership, to instruct and guide other programmers, which I enjoyed very much: teaching, watching their growth and which uses the best development practices for their projects. I can proudly say that I have created complete standalone systems from scratch, as well as designed complete infrastructures (from local servers to the cloud), which are running flawlessly and, after all these years, I still can't find an application that I can't do.
experiencesList.description2: This is where it all began. As a mechatronics engineer, my initial focus was process automation: optimizing functionalities, enhancing equipment safety, and implementing technical improvements. To achieve end-to-end integrations, I transitioned into software development, building over 30 applications (desktop and web) from scratch—each designed to streamline critical operational tasks and address specific production needs. A key achievement was the automation of technical documentation for in-house manufactured components. This not only ensured quality standards but also transformed a manual process into a fully digital workflow. The innovation eliminated paper usage and enabled specialized equipment fabrication in-house, cutting implementation costs and time—with estimated annual savings exceeding $1 million USD.

stacksDescription: Some of the software and technologies I use on a daily basis
faqDescription: Things people usually ask me about

servicesfaq.q2: What if I need something customized?
servicesfaq.q3: Do you provide maintenance after it's done?
servicesfaq.q4: What other things do you do?
servicesfaq.a1: I develop software projects from scratch—whether simple or complex apps for any environment (local, industrial, cloud)—including desktop apps, APIs, web, and mobile solutions.
servicesfaq.a2: Of course! Tell me what you need, and we’ll make it happen.
servicesfaq.a3: Yes, I offer maintenance packages for updates, adjustments, and backups to keep your project running smoothly.
servicesfaq.a4: Consulting, automation, databases, and configuring local or cloud servers.

pricefaq.q1: How much does a project cost?
pricefaq.a1: Apps range from $300 to $10,000 USD depending on the project. Maintenance and consulting are $40–150 USD per hour.
pricefaq.a2: Usually for first-time clients with simple needs or non-profit organizations.
pricefaq.a3: For large or long-term projects, we can negotiate.

personalfaq.q2: Do you love what you do?
personalfaq.q3: What sets you apart from other programmers?
personalfaq.q4: Any advice for someone who wants to be a developer?
personalfaq.a1: Funny enough, I started as a Mechatronics Engineer, but challenges in the industry and custom solutions became my passion—one thing led to another.
personalfaq.a2: I *love* coding! Learning new things and seeing how my solutions fix people’s problems is awesome. (Though, yeah, it pays the bills too.)
personalfaq.a3: Total dedication. I take full ownership of projects, dive deep into every detail, and collaborate closely to meet all user needs. If 100% is expected, I give 120%.
personalfaq.a4: First, you’ve gotta love it. Then, just start tinkering and typing away.
